text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c620c055ce8505596a7208ba696a32b8a3be4f4b|patch 8.2.1154: Vim9: crash when using imported function>
patch 8.2.1154: Vim9: crash when using imported function

Problem:    Vim9: crash when using imported function.
Solution:   Check for a function type.  Set the script context when calling a
            function. (closes #6412)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1154: Vim9: crash when using imported function · vim/vim@c620c05
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1154: Vim9: crash when using imported function · vim/vim@c620c05
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when using imported function. Solution: Check for a function type. Set the script context when calling a function. (closes #6412)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bb790dcc46b74e6f9a1c4126be8a575f9fe73444|patch 8.2.1150: ml_get error when using Python>
patch 8.2.1150: ml_get error when using Python

Problem:    ml_get error when using Python. (Yegappan Lakshmanan)
Solution:   Check the line number is not out of range.  Call "Check" with
            "fromObj" instead of "from".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1150: ml_get error when using Python · vim/vim@bb790dc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1150: ml_get error when using Python · vim/vim@bb790dc
attachments.text: Problem: ml_get error when using Python. (Yegappan Lakshmanan) Solution: Check the line number is not out of range. Call &quot;Check&quot; with &quot;fromObj&quot; instead of &quo...

patch 8.2.1151: insufficient test coverage for Python

Solution:   Add more test cases. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6415)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/fe465a01cfbbbae5d870d6108e0ad0947f03b0c4|patch 8.2.1152: Vim9: function reference is missing script prefix>
patch 8.2.1152: Vim9: function reference is missing script prefix

Problem:    Vim9: function reference is missing script prefix.
Solution:   Use the actual function name instead of the name searched for in
            the script context. (closes #6412)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1152: Vim9: function reference is missing script prefix · vim/vim@fe465a0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1152: Vim9: function reference is missing script prefix · vim/vim@fe465a0
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: function reference is missing script prefix. Solution: Use the actual function name instead of the name searched for in the script context. (closes #6412)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bed36b939a4c66f41d1f24e32cfa521b10f22b82|patch 8.2.1153: Vim9: script test fails on some systems>
patch 8.2.1153: Vim9: script test fails on some systems

Problem:    Vim9: script test fails on some systems.
Solution:   Return proper value from Compare().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1153: Vim9: script test fails on some systems · vim/vim@bed36b9

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: script test fails on some systems. Solution: Return proper value from Compare().
